row.Docu: This pack is a pre-requisite of using the ARA provisioning feature. It has to be installed prior utilising this feature in ARA. The pack contains a registry container (a VARA object) as well as hooks to wrap provisioning/de-provisioning workflows of provider-specific implementations (e.g. for Docker, VMware etc..). Note, that these objects are moved into PACKAGES/APPDATA/PCK.AUTOMIC_PROVISIONING upon installation of the pack. See those objects for further details.
